        Reads all bytes from the stream into a byte array.

        Parameters:
        inputStream - the InputStream
        Returns:
        the array of bytes from the stream
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem reading the stream

      • copyAsString

        public static String copyAsString(BufferedInputStream inputStream)
                           throws IOException,
                                  IllegalStateException

        Safely copies the contents of the BufferedInputStream to a String and resets the stream. This method is generally only useful for testing and logging purposes.

        Parameters:
        inputStream - the BufferedInputStream
        Returns:
        a String copy of the stream contents
        Throws:
        IOException - if something goes wrong with the stream
        IllegalStateException - if the stream cannot be reset

      • transfer

        public static void transfer(InputStream istream,
                            OutputStream ostream,
                            boolean close)

        Transfers the contents of the InputStream into the OutputStream, optionally closing the stream.

        Parameters:
        istream - the input stream
        ostream - the output stream
        close - whether or not to close the output stream
